Text:
"When an island off the coast of Ireland is invaded by bloodsucking aliens, the heroes discover that getting drunk is the only way to survive."

Wasn't that the trick to killing the aliens in Scary Movie 3?  Or was it 4?  Either way, not interested in another parody movie, especially one that's less original than the material it's ripping off.

It's not really a parody, it's played completely straight. I found it enjoyable enough. Nothing we haven't seen before obviously. It's a monster movie.

A/V were both fine. M was fun.
